execution one well esteemed province whilst hottest variety opinion stept forth propound began speak thus wish misfortune deplorably teach u perverse fury sea prof sometimes country see daily inforst oppose industry threat thereof hath mountainous bank sufficient curb tempest wave time e hath swallowed whole island side caused miserable unbeard ruines part wee seeke remedy present necessitie evills doe often afflict u let nature worke effect day good useth upon many occasion doe hurt weapon wherewith make war u let u example make war upon enemy every one know two equinoxials year ocean swels extraordinary high upon coast season year shortly expect effect thereof councel shall therefore may immediately high tide begin let water loose neighbouring ground leyden greater tide hereafter follow thus turning siege upon besieger may hope destroy enemy within work time free city danger may thought impossible relieve land ordinary way channel river whereas way prescribed may believe enterprise smiled success power let inundation please shall see enemy strangely astonished confused shame abandoning siege horror continuing forced last fly shall see weapon nature conspire together slaughtering side shall see punishment justly transferd open violence prepared innocent country shall drowned doubtlesly indamaged thereby would bear inconvenience whereby country shall receive great benefit contrary whose hair stand end think loss harlem leyden whole province shortly remain cruel spaniard must sometimes wicked good oft cut one member welfare safeguard rest body yet evil prove finally great time paid great usury worldly action prove memorable strike envy dumb add new tongue fame certainly every highly celebrated boldly give advice confidently pronounce augury hope event happened midst english fleet hollander zealander thus fleet stand still one whole day till night came dark vessel fire middle size might seen come unawares towards spanish ship eight number came enemy invention winde rose sudden blowing whereof spaniard feared flame would gather force one ship gave another farthest thought danger nearest confusion would allow command horror night increased disorder every howsoever would great enough day aforesaid fireboat notwithstanding chiefly made terror make beleeved siege antwerp spanish ship avoided imaginary fear fire could shun true apprehension diego di pimentel another called philip francis toledo captain ship fought good succourd capitana made hold longer likewise many time shot last forced leave two seek save self two continued valiant drowned great loss sea still threatning greater duke medina councel thought fit mean carry back fleet spain soon possible might already plainly seen impossible cleanse coast flanders enemy ship absolutely necessary catholick army transported england moreover already known well queen provided within land purpose pleased shew self couragiously horseback abovesaid army applause action exprest whether could doe unexpectedly way stratagem could effect siege thought might fall parisian relieved wholly drowned enjoying effect thereof restoring sleep rest case negligence might neglect keep squadron foot sent many ladder midnight towards wall one came wall st germains st mihil third st jaques st marcelles success answer expectation duke nemours governour paris exceeding vigilant wayes returned gaunt soon usual abode brussels autumn mean ran summer extraordinary toyl labour much tired army side wherefore needfull repose therefore drawn field put garrison soone yeere ended began marquis spinola yet court spain therefore would longer delay going thither hoped taking ostend would make better received court cause return better satisfied flanders archduke willing let go afterwards sent praise might best going return went away latter end year honourably received king whole court wherein treated long affair flanders shewing particular must use mean carry war enemy country passing rhine displaying king banner part rebel might receive greater punishment nearer home lively represented unruly mutiny way prevent paying souldier well well listened unto thing king thought fitting return possible speed back flanders departure made declared campmastergeneral governor force province giving great authority destributing monies also exercise command honoured golden eleece fully satisfied manner demonstration returned well pleased flanders arriving brussels good bils exchange forthwith caused mutiniers satisfied strict order given raising new men germany others possibly could field first marched designe none bold greater concernment could imagined therein answered fortune count maurice assembled together beginning may foot horse imbarking greatest part count straiten enemy could part purpose extraordinary force two last field raised though great advantage gotten thereby yet fell far short conceived hope seen spain could continue maintain excessive expence want money new mutiny happened another might insue one disorder much confound distort whole body army spinola troubled reflection importance last fell upon consideration already diver gravest best experienced stateministers spain flanders faln upon touching difficulty danger warre flanders going weaken subdue enemy force arm brought discoursed thus amogst good reaped forty year war made enemy strong resolute defend usurpt liberty firm union established amongst better united forein prince whho sided nature self might said fought always bulwark sea river strong scituations part nature wanting industry together wih many well munited place make amends power land verygreat thing else power sea great crown spain much indamaged thereby even eastindies danger greater sufferer westindies also amass strength side money must cost king maintain war flanders doubtlesly empire large much discunited flanders disunited member whole body dominion sea land sea blocked enemy ship passage land depend upon many prince alwaies caused great difficulty sending aid destroyed men march bickering many corruption disorder rooted army could remedied war effect long war inevitably produced instead obedience strife reigned amongst nation wife souldiers mutiny year force almost dangerous enemy mutiny growing familiar one another nation ofttimes many nation sad day would whole army mutiny together
